summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 12.0°C) and outside temperature (down 11.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11672 lux) and cloud levels (up 373 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15962 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 258 m), and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 425m and a high of 1526m, averaging 579.5m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and winds should remain light. Possible light showers, overcast skies with low cloud, and light levels will be low during the day. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
